CatDescriptText: Mr. R. O. Jones, 2807 Bedford Avenue, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 28, 1958, pg. 3 with question: "What do you think is wrong with the Pittsburgh Pirates? Do you think that they are using their best ball players at all times?" answer reads: "Yes, he does have a free hand."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of R.O. Jones wearing moustache, dark pleated striped pants, and tweed hat, standing at corner of Roosevelt Hotel with picture of marlin on fishing line, on Penn Avenue, Stanley Theatre on left, Downtown
